findings.description: Missing access control (anyone can list markets / set collateral factors)
findings.reasoning: While valid, this is not the target vulnerability. It's a separate issue about market configuration.

findings.description: Free collateral credit / broken accounting (deposit without transferring underlying)
findings.reasoning: Valid issue but not the target vulnerability. It's about incorrect accounting rather than price oracle manipulation.

findings.description: Incorrect collateral/borrow valuation due to hardcoded zero-address market list (collateral check bypass/DoS depending on oracle behavior)
findings.reasoning: This finding is related to the target vulnerability but doesn't fully capture the price oracle manipulation aspect.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The target vulnerability (price_oracle_manipulation) was not identified in the findings.

notes: The audit findings missed the critical price oracle manipulation vulnerability. Two valid issues were identified but were not the target vulnerability. One finding partially matched the target but didn't fully capture the oracle manipulation aspect.
